Title: 227: Enhancing Your Mobile Gaming Experience With Data Science
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Data Science Influencer, Sarah Nooravi, who inspires the data science community in many different ways. You will hear about Sarah's background and interests, from culinary chef to nuclear fusion, and how she found her way to data science. You will also hear a specific case study of data science in the marketing and mobile gaming industry and Sarah's role in it. You will learn about diversity in data science and how the community can help inspire data scientists to be successful.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/227
